Title: Relates to establishing a procedure for the governor's annual message to the legislature regarding the state of the state
Summary: Relates to establishing a procedure for the governor's annual message to the legislature regarding the state of the state.
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 3 of article 4 of the constitution, in relation to establishing a procedure for the governor's annual message to the legislature regarding the state of the state
